## Domain Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The Domain resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Domain<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The domain this Domain represents. These must be unique in our system; you cannot have two Domains representing the same domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>If this Domain represents the authoritative source of information for the domain it describes, or if it is a read-only copy of a master (also called a slave).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Axfr<wbr>Ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The list of IPs that may perform a zone transfer for this Domain. This is potentially dangerous, and should be set to an empty list unless you intend to use it.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A description for this Domain. This is for display purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Expire<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The amount of time in seconds that may pass before this Domain is no longer authoritative. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Group</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The group this Domain belongs to. This is for display purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Master<wbr>Ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The IP addresses representing the master DNS for this Domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Refresh<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The amount of time in seconds before this Domain should be refreshed. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Retry<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The interval, in seconds, at which a failed refresh should be retried. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Soa<wbr>Email</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Start of Authority email address. This is required for master Domains.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Used to control whether this Domain is currently being rendered (defaults to "active").
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of tags applied to this object. Tags are for organizational purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Ttl<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>'Time to Live' - the amount of time in seconds that this Domain's records may be cached by resolvers or other domain servers. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

</dl>

            title="Optional">
        <span>tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of tags applied to this object. Tags are for organizational purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>ttl<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>'Time to Live' - the amount of time in seconds that this Domain's records may be cached by resolvers or other domain servers. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

</dl>




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>domain</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The domain this Domain represents. These must be unique in our system; you cannot have two Domains representing the same domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>If this Domain represents the authoritative source of information for the domain it describes, or if it is a read-only copy of a master (also called a slave).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>axfr_<wbr>ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The list of IPs that may perform a zone transfer for this Domain. This is potentially dangerous, and should be set to an empty list unless you intend to use it.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A description for this Domain. This is for display purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>expire_<wbr>sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The amount of time in seconds that may pass before this Domain is no longer authoritative. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>group</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The group this Domain belongs to. This is for display purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>master_<wbr>ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The IP addresses representing the master DNS for this Domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>refresh_<wbr>sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The amount of time in seconds before this Domain should be refreshed. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>retry_<wbr>sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The interval, in seconds, at which a failed refresh should be retried. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>soa_<wbr>email</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Start of Authority email address. This is required for master Domains.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Used to control whether this Domain is currently being rendered (defaults to "active").
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of tags applied to this object. Tags are for organizational purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>ttl_<wbr>sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>'Time to Live' - the amount of time in seconds that this Domain's records may be cached by resolvers or other domain servers. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

</dl>

## Look up an Existing Domain Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing Domain resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.

        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>

The following state arguments are supported:




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Axfr<wbr>Ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The list of IPs that may perform a zone transfer for this Domain. This is potentially dangerous, and should be set to an empty list unless you intend to use it.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A description for this Domain. This is for display purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Domain<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The domain this Domain represents. These must be unique in our system; you cannot have two Domains representing the same domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Expire<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The amount of time in seconds that may pass before this Domain is no longer authoritative. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Group</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>
    <dd>The IP addresses representing the master DNS for this Domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"

    </dt>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>

</dd>

    </dt>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>

Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Start of Authority email address. This is required for master Domains.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Used to control whether this Domain is currently being rendered (defaults to "active").
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">[]string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of tags applied to this object. Tags are for organizational purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Ttl<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>'Time to Live' - the amount of time in seconds that this Domain's records may be cached by resolvers or other domain servers. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>If this Domain represents the authoritative source of information for the domain it describes, or if it is a read-only copy of a master (also called a slave).
</dd>

</dl>




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>axfr<wbr>Ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The list of IPs that may perform a zone transfer for this Domain. This is potentially dangerous, and should be set to an empty list unless you intend to use it.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A description for this Domain. This is for display purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>domain</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The domain this Domain represents. These must be unique in our system; you cannot have two Domains representing the same domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>expire<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The amount of time in seconds that may pass before this Domain is no longer authoritative. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>group</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The group this Domain belongs to. This is for display purposes only.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>master<wbr>Ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The IP addresses representing the master DNS for this Domain.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>refresh<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The amount of time in seconds before this Domain should be refreshed. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>retry<wbr>Sec</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The interval, in seconds, at which a failed refresh should be retried. Valid values are 300, 3600, 7200, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 172800, 345600, 604800, 1209600, and 2419200 - any other value will be rounded to the nearest valid value.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>soa<wbr>Email</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Start of Authority email address. This is required for master Domains.
</dd>

            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>

</dd>
